Donate to Election Campaigns

Supporting candidates in key elections is one of the most effective ways to influence immigration policy and hold ICE accountable. Your donation can help elect leaders who will fight for immigrant rights and real reform.

  • See competitive House races (Cook Political Report) – Nonpartisan analysis of the most competitive U.S. House races.
  • See competitive Senate races (Cook Political Report) – Nonpartisan analysis of the most competitive U.S. Senate races.
  • State and Local Election Alliance – focuses solely on non-federal offices, driving resources to where they’ll make the most impact and often at a fraction of the cost.

Research candidates and donate directly to their campaigns or through trusted platforms for maximum impact.

Advocacy Organizations

Support these organizations working for immigrant rights, legal aid, and social justice in Massachusetts and beyond:

  • Indivisible MA
  • Indivisible LAB
  • MIRA Coalition (Massachusetts Immigrant & Refugee Advocacy Coalition)
  • LUCE (Lawyers for Civil Rights)
  • ACLU of Massachusetts

Your support helps these groups provide legal aid, advocacy, and direct assistance to immigrants and their families.
